title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - | Configure Teams DLP policies to automatically protect files shared in Teams messages (US Government clouds)
description:
New and existing Teams DLP policies can be configured to automatically protect files shared in Teams private chats and channel messages.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/dlp-microsoft-teams?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: June CY2022
